00021 #define __S_ISTYPE(mode, mask)  (((mode) & _S_IFMT) == (mask))
00022 
00023 #undef S_ISDIR
00024 #undef S_ISCHR
00025 #undef S_ISBLK
00026 #undef S_ISREG
00027 #define S_ISDIR(mode)    __S_ISTYPE((mode), _S_IFDIR)
00028 #define S_ISCHR(mode)    __S_ISTYPE((mode), _S_IFCHR)
00029 #define S_ISBLK(mode)    __S_ISTYPE((mode), _S_IFBLK)
00030 #define S_ISREG(mode)    __S_ISTYPE((mode), _S_IFREG)
00031 /* we don't support symlinks */
00032 #define S_ISLNK(mode)    0

00038 /* retrieve the most recent network, or general libc error */
00039 #define light_sock_errno() (WSAGetLastError())

00071 #define PATHNAME_APPEND_SLASH(x) \
00072         if (x->used > 1 && x->ptr[x->used - 2] != DIR_SEPERATOR) { \
00073         char sl[2] = { DIR_SEPERATOR, 0 }; \
00074         BUFFER_APPEND_STRING_CONST(x, sl); \
00075     }
